movie.title: Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot
movie.plot: On the rocky path to sobriety after a life-changing accident, John Callahan discovers the healing power of art, willing his injured hands into drawing hilarious, often controversial cartoons, which bring him a new lease on life.

events.title: John Callahan is paralysed in a car crash
